b'<!DOCTYPE html>\n\n<!--[if IE 8]>\r\n<html class="ie8" lang="en-US" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns# fb: http://ogp.me/ns/fb#"> <![endif]-->\n<!--[if IE 9]>\r\n<html class="ie9" lang="en-US" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns# fb: http://ogp.me/ns/fb#"> <![endif]-->\n<!--[if (gt IE 9)|!(IE)] lang="en-US" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns# fb: http://ogp.me/ns/fb#"><![endif]-->\n<html lang="en-US" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns# fb: http://ogp.me/ns/fb#">\n<head>\n<meta charset="utf8"/>\n<meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" name="viewport"/>\n<!-- feeds & pingback -->\n<link href="https://gmpg.org/xfn/11" rel="profile"/>\n<link href="https://truepattaya.org/xmlrpc.php" rel="pingback"/>\n<title>KryptoFranc crypto currency coin altcoin, by Nicolas Choukroun and Jean Martial Lefranc.</title>\n<meta content="Kryptofranc" property="og:site_name"/>\n<meta content="https://kryptofranc.com/" property="og:url"/>\n<meta content="Kryptofranc (KYF) is a new cryptocurrency. Half the potential supply of KYF has been pre mined and will be donated over 10 years to charities dedicated to human rights and Earth preservation. Kryptofranc will be updated to insure permanent compatibility with Bitcoin Core. Donations will be decided by the community of KYF called upon to vote on the causes they intend to support." property="og:title"/>\n<meta content="article" property="og:type"/>\n<meta content="https://kryptofranc.com/img/kryptowebmain.jpg" property="og:image"/>\n<meta content="2048" property="og:image:width"/>\n<meta content="1152" property="og:image:height"/>\n<meta content="summary" name="twitter:card"/>\n<meta content="@KryptoFranc.com" name="twitter:site"/>\n<meta content="Nicolas Choukroun" name="twitter:creator"/>\n<meta content="https://KryptoFranc.com" name="twitter:url"/>\n<meta content="KryptoFranc cryptocurrency" name="twitter:title"/>\n<meta content="https://kryptofranc.com/img/kryptowebmain.jpg" name="twitter:image"/>\n<meta "="" content="Kryptofranc (KYF) is a new cryptocurrency. Half the potential supply of KYF has been pre mined and will be donated over 10 years to charities dedicated to human rights and Earth preservation. Kryptofranc will be updated to insure permanent compatibility with Bitcoin Core. Donations will be decided by the community of KYF called upon to vote on the causes they intend to support." name="twitter:description"/>\n<link href="/css/socicon.min.css" media="all" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="/css/theme-blue.css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="/css/theme-extras.css?i=2" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="/css/custom.css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="/3rdparty/widgets/pcw/assets/css/style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="https://cdn.datatables.net/1.10.20/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Titillium+Web:100,300,400,600,700" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto+Slab:400,300|Source+Sans+Pro:400,300,600,400italic" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Fira+Sans&amp;display=swap" rel="stylesheet"/>\n<link href="/apple-touch-icon.png" rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180"/>\n<link href="/favicon-32x32.png" rel="icon" sizes="32x32" type="image/png"/>\n<link href="/favicon-16x16.png" rel="icon" sizes="16x16" type="image/png"/>\n<link href="/site.webmanifest" rel="manifest"/>\n<link color="#5bbad5" href="/safari-pinned-tab.svg" rel="mask-icon"/>\n<meta content="#da532c" name="msapplication-TileColor"/>\n<meta content="#ffffff" name="theme-color"/>\n<meta content="Nicolas Choukroun" name="author"/>\n<meta content="The KryptoFranc is a new altcoin, which purpose is to support organizations and individuals who defend human and citizen rights all over the world. Today, the conditions in which charities raise funds seem\r\n              less and less efficient, with ever increasing marketing costs for profits that, although they grow in absolute value, frequently deteriorate in terms of the relationship between collected and distributed funds. The ambition of the KryptoFranc is to bring new fundraising solutions for NGOs or individuals through the creation of a large community of voters who will select the cause(s) that will receive a significant part of our money supply every fortnight. The voting process will happen online via traditional web channels. Organizations and individuals who wish to apply for a donation will also have to do it online. Every fortnight, the KryptoFranc community will decide on a donation to a defender or a cause that support human rights, freedom and preservation of the Earth. The KryptoFranc already disposes of 2 billions premined KYF, which will be distributed in over a period of 10 years as free donations to causes we support. We believe that freedom in all its form has to be defended when and how the community decides it. In addition to voting, members of the community will be able to support causes that already received KryptoFrancs by buying the currency on the open market via the various exchange platforms on which it will be available. In that regard, we will create a dedicated exchange platform for charities to use and monetize their KryptoFrancs. This exchange platform will not be exclusive but will ensure the initial solvency of the currency. We count on this leverage tool to channel large financial flows in favor of freedom in the coming years. We believe that the KryptoFranc initiative can spark interest among a large audience for the following reasons: The very large audience of donors. In industrialized countries, nearly 60% of the adult population donates to charities every year. The growing number of organizations in need of funding. The United States alone is home to more than 1,2 millions charities. These organizations collect over 400 billion dollars every year. The phenomenon has now spread all over the world and Africa has become the continent with the fastest growth of charitable donations. In this environment, we believe that the KryptoFranc can become a reference altcoin for charities \xe2\x80\x93several millions structures worldwideas well as donors \xe2\x80\x93several hundreds millions of individuals. We are looking to initiate a virtuous circle in which donations will attract more donations and sustain the growth rate of the currency. This growth will attract investors and speculators who will replenish our initial donations." name="description"/>\n<link href="/css/font-titillium.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n<!--<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@3.5.1/dist/jquery.min.js"></script>-->\n<script src="/js/jquery-2.1.4.min.js"></script>\n<!--<script class="alert alert-danger" role="alert">\r\n  We are proceeding to a swap between KYF and FRANC at CREX24. During this process, the trading with KYF has been suspended. It will be restored soon, but KYF will be renamed to FRANC. Thanks for your patience.\r\n  <a href="https://twitter.com/Crex_24/status/1370706810341105667">Update: KYF withdrawals have been re-enabled. In you do not want to swap your KYF coins, please withdraw them before March 26, 2021. Otherwise these coins will be swapped.</a>\n</div>\n<div class="main-container">\n<section class="height-40 imagebg section-hero-1 bg--primary" data-overlay="7" id="particles" ">\n<div class="pos-vertical-center" style="margin-top:-700px;margin-left:20%;">\n<div class="row">\n<div class="col-sm-12 container hidden-sm hidden-xs">\n<h1>\n<b>Kryptofranc</b> 2019-2021</h1><br/>\n<h2>The crypto that gives and keeps on giving</h2>\n<a class="btn btn--white btn--unfilled" href="/press.php">\n<span class="btn__text">Press</span>\n<i style="text-align:center;">Mining Rig retals</p></center>\n<a class="btn btn-danger" href="https://www.miningrigrentals.com/rigs/sha256">Rent Hashrate at low price</a>\n</center>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-3 shadowed" style="height:350px;">\n<center><b>Some Portfolios</b></center>\n<center>\n<a href="https://blockfolio.com/coin/KYF"><img src="/img/blockfolio.png" width="160"/></a>\n<br/>\n<a href="https://airdropalert.com/cointracker/cryptocurrencies/kryptofranc"><img src="/img/airdropalert.png" width="160"/></a>\n<br/>\n<a href="https://thecrypto.app/"><img src="/img/cryptoapp.jpg" width="160"/></a>\n</center>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section>\n<div class="row">\n<div class="col-md-12">\n<div class="container">\n<h1>Why Kryptofranc?</h1>\n<p>This is a short video explaining all the point that should you make an investor trush our project. Kryptofranc is not just another. It has brain and heart: listen and watch!</p>\n<center>\n<iframe allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="600" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5fWga3NxrQc" width="560"></iframe>\n</center>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section>\n<div class="container">\n<div class="row mb64 mb-xs-24">\n<div class="col-md-10 col-md-offset-1 col-sm-12 text-center">\n<h3>What is KryptoFranc?</h3>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class="row">\n<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6 mb40 mb-xs-24">\n<i class="ti-layers icon inline-block mb16 fade-3-4"></i>\n<h4>Introduction</h4>\n<p>\r\nKryptoFranc (KYF) is a new cryptocurrency. Half the potential supply of KYF has been pre mined and will be donated over 10 years to charities dedicated to human rights and Earth preservation. KryptoFranc will be updated to insure permanent compatibility with Bitcoin Core. Donations will be decided by the community of KYF called upon to vote on the causes they intend to support. KryptoFranc will become money as a social network and leverage its speculative appeal to disperse wealth supporting good deeds.                    </p>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6 mb40 mb-xs-24">\n<i class="ti-gallery icon inline-block mb16 fade-3-4"></i>\n<h4>Bitcoin Core with improvements</h4>\n<p>\r\nKryptoFranc is a peer-to-peer Internet currency that enables instant, near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world. KryptoFranc is an open source, global payment network that is fully decentralized without any central authorities. Mathematics secures the network and empowers individuals to control their own finances. Kryptofranc features faster transaction confirmation, quicker difficulty adjustment, smoother subsidy, and it is mining endlessly.                    </p>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6 mb40 mb-xs-24">\n<i class="ti-infinite icon inline-block mb16 fade-3-4"></i>\n<h4>With some unique features.</h4>\n<p>\r\n- Max Circulating Supply: about 10 Billions.<br/>- End of Mining: never, mine at infinity.<br/>- New block target every: 2.5 min.<br/>- Difficulty readjustment: every 10 blocks.<br/>- Price target: 0.1789 BTC = 1 KYF.<br/><br/>- Rank target: in the 100 first crypto.<br/>- Mining: about 2000 KYF per Block every 2.5 min .<br/>- SHA256 minable with Asic, GPU and CPU .                    </p>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-12 col-sm-6 mb40 mb-xs-24">\n<i class="ti-gallery icon inline-block mb16 fade-3-4"></i>\n<h4>The \'Popular\'.</h4>\n<p>\r\nKryptofranc will give to the NGO a new modern tool to collect donations. Investors are not only investing into a cryptocurrency, but they also give to the NGO who received our KYF more wealth. It is a win/win system where speculation generates money for the speculators and for the NGO at the same time. The more the KYF grows, the more the NGO are getting rich. The NGO are also helping the investor by giving to the KYF the popularity and notority needed to raise above the rest with all the buzz, the votes, the press releases and the emails sent by the NGO to their members. The KYF will become \'popular\' because it reaches far beyond the small crypto/investors community.                    </p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section></div>\n\n<section class="imageblock section-snippet-about" style="background-color:white;">\n<div class="container">\n<div class="row">\n<div class="imageblock__content col-md-6 pos-left hidden-sm hidden-xs allow-overflow" style="margin-top:0px;">\n<img align="right" alt="image" class="shadow" src="img/kryptofranc-cover.jpg" style="margin-bottom:200px;position: absolute;right: 20px;"/>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-6 col-md-push-6 col-sm-8 col-sm-push-2" style="margin-top:0px;">\n<h3>The KryptoFranc proposes an adequate answer to these issues: </h3>\n<p>\r\n                    1- Charities can access our community without spending any resources.<br/> \r\n2- Recruiting new community members does not require big marketing spending and more importantly, members can enter the community for free.<br/> \r\n3- The donation voting system strongly engages the community who can decide which cause to support via a very transparent process. <br/>\r\n4- The initial donation is made thanks to the money supply reserve without financial commitment from the community members. <br/>\r\n5- Once the donation is confirmed, members of the community can choose to value it by buying KryptoFrancs on the market, thus consolidating its price and solvency for the selected charities.<br/>\n<br/>For us, the key to success lies in the fact that the initial commitment is free. Besides, KryptoFranc donations are a way to engage not only hundreds millions of donors but also dozens millions of cryptocurrency investors and speculators. \r\n                </p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class="section-snippet-about-1 bg--secondary">\n<div class="container">\n<h1>Compare with others</h1>\n<p>Kryptofranc is designed to last, having all the features the best crypto have, and some unique that should drive it at the top of the crypto ranking... just be patient.</p>\n<table class="blueTable">\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Crypto</th>\n<th>Mining</th>\n<th>SEGWITH</th>\n<th>Lightning Network</th>\n<th>True Blockchain</th>\n<th>Max Supply</th>\n<th>Current Supply</th>\n<th>Decentralized</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td><img align="left" src="/img/kyf32.png"/> (BNB)</td>\n<td style="background-color:#fbb;">No</td>\n<td style="background-color:#fbb;">No</td>\n<td style="background-color:#fbb;">No</td>\n<td href="https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Martial_Lefranc"> Wikipedia</a>\n<br/><b>Role</b>: Marketing / Finance / Concept\r\n                    </p>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class="col-sm-6">\n<div </p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div></section>\n<section class="section-snippet-about-1 bg--secondary">\n<div class="container">\n<div class="row pos-vertical-align-columns">\n<div class="col-sm-5">\n<h3>Interested?<br class="hidden-xs hidden-sm"/> here is where you can contact us.</h3>\n<p>\r\nFeel free to download and contribute to this project. You can also contact us for press articles, interviews or investment opportunities.                </p>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class="row">\n<div class="col-sm-12 text-center">\n<div class="partner-logos">\n<a href="https://discord.gg/7qscn6S"><img alt="Client" src="/img/iconfinder_discord.png"/></a>\n<a href="https://fb.com/kryptofranc"><img alt="Client" src="/img/iconfinder_facebook.png"/></a>\n<a href="https://twitter.com/kryptofranc"><img alt="Client" src="/img/logo-twitter.png"/></a>\n<a href="https://t.me/KryptoFranc"> <img alt="Client" src="/img/logo-telegram.png"/></a>\n<a href="https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5157308"><img alt="Client" src="/img/logo-bitcointalk.png"/></a>\n<a href="https://github.com/NicolasChoukroun/Kryptofranc"><img alt="Client" src="/img/logo-github.png"/></a>\n</div>\n</div> </div>\n</div>\n</section>\n\n<footer class="bg--primary"><center>\n<div class="footer-auxilary" id="particles-js2">\n<div class="row container">\n<div class="col-md-12 centered" style="margin-top:-100px;">\n<center><iframe class="mj-w-res-iframe" frameborder="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" scrolling="no" src="https://app.mailjet.com/widget/iframe/4FqU/jYl" width="100%"></iframe>\n<script src="https://app.mailjet.com/statics/js/iframeResizer.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>\n</center>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class="row container">\n<div class="col-md-4">\n<img align="right" alt="Logo KYF Kryptofranc" src="/img/coinmarketcap-200x200-trans.png" width="100"/>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-4">\n<p>\n<b> Links</b><br/>\n<a href="/privacy.php">Privacy Policy</a><br/>\n<a href="https://wolfonlinekingdom.com">Wolf Online Kingdom (W.O.K)</a><br/>\n<a href="https://wolfonlinekingdom.com/roadmap/">Roadmap</a><br/>\n<a href="https://franc.eu.com">Franc</a><br/>\n</p>\n</div>\n<div class="col-md-4">\n<p>\xc2\xa9 Copyright 2021 All Rights Reserved<br/>\r\n                Website: Nikko, contact kryptofranc at yandex.com (replace the at by @)<br/>\n<br/><a href="/whitepaper.php">Download our White Paper</a>\n<a href="https://www.coinpayments.net/downloads/CoinPayments_User_Agreement.pdf">Coinpayments.net User Agreement</a>\n</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</center>\n\n</footer>\n\n<!-- Facebook Pixel Code -->\n<script>\r\n    !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s)\r\n    {\r\n        if (f.fbq)\r\n            return;\r\n        n = f.fbq = function () {\r\n            n.callMethod ?\r\n                    n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)\r\n        };\r\n        if (!f._fbq)\r\n            f._fbq = n;\r\n        n.push = n;\r\n        n.loaded = !0;\r\n        n.version = \'2.0\';\r\n        n.queue = [];\r\n        t = b.createElement(e);\r\n        t.async = !0;\r\n        t.src = v;\r\n        s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];\r\n        s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)\r\n    }(window, document, \'script\',\r\n            \'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js\');\r\n    fbq(\'init\', \'549018825696559\');\r\n    fbq(\'track\', \'PageView\');\r\n</script>\n<noscript><img height="1" src="https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=549018825696559&amp;ev=PageView&amp;noscript=1" style="display:none" width="1"/></noscript>\n<!-- End Facebook Pixel Code -->\n<script src="https://cdn.datatables.net/1.10.20/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js"></script>\n<script src="/3rdparty/widgets/pcw/assets/js/dist/app.js"></script>\n<script>\r\n/*\r\n * @author  - @sebagarcia\r\n * @version 1.1.0\r\n * Inspired & based on "Particleground" by Jonathan Nicol\r\n */\r\n\r\n;(function(window, document) {\r\n  "use strict";\r\n  var pluginName = \'particleground\';\r\n\r\n  // http://youmightnotneedjquery.com/#deep_extend\r\n  function extend(out) {\r\n    out = out || {};\r\n    for (var i = 1; i < arguments.length; i++) {\r\n      var obj = arguments[i];\r\n      if (!obj) continue;\r\n      for (var key in obj) {\r\n        if (obj.hasOwnProperty(key)) {\r\n          if (typeof obj[key] === \'object\')\r\n            deepExtend(out[key], obj[key]);\r\n          else\r\n            out[key] = obj[key];\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n    return out;\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  var $ = window.jQuery;\r\n\r\n  function Plugin(element, options) {\r\n    var canvasSupport = !!document.createElement(\'canvas\').getContext;\r\n    var canvas;\r\n    var ctx;\r\n    var particles = [];\r\n    var raf;\r\n    var mouseX = 0;\r\n    var mouseY = 0;\r\n    var winW;\r\n    var winH;\r\n    var desktop = !navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone|iPod|iPad|Android|BlackBerry|BB10|mobi|tablet|opera mini|nexus 7)/i);\r\n    var orientationSupport = !!window.DeviceOrientationEvent;\r\n    var tiltX = 0;\r\n    var pointerX;\r\n    var pointerY;\r\n    var tiltY = 0;\r\n    var paused = false;\r\n\r\n    options = extend({}, window[pluginName].defaults, options);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Init\r\n     */\r\n    function init() {\r\n      if (!canvasSupport) { return; }\r\n\r\n      //Create canvas\r\n      canvas = document.createElement(\'canvas\');\r\n      canvas.className = \'pg-canvas\';\r\n      canvas.style.display = \'block\';\r\n      element.insertBefore(canvas, element.firstChild);\r\n      ctx = canvas.getContext(\'2d\');\r\n      styleCanvas();\r\n\r\n      // Create particles\r\n      var numParticles = Math.round((canvas.width * canvas.height) / options.density);\r\n      for (var i = 0; i < numParticles; i++) {\r\n        var p = new Particle();\r\n        p.setStackPos(i);\r\n        particles.push(p);\r\n      };\r\n\r\n      window.addEventListener(\'resize\', function() {\r\n        resizeHandler();\r\n      }, false);\r\n\r\n      document.addEventListener(\'mousemove\', function(e) {\r\n        mouseX = e.pageX;\r\n        mouseY = e.pageY;\r\n      }, false);\r\n\r\n      if (orientationSupport && !desktop) {\r\n        window.addEventListener(\'deviceorientation\', function () {\r\n          // Contrain tilt range to [-30,30]\r\n          tiltY = Math.min(Math.max(-event.beta, -30), 30);\r\n          tiltX = Math.min(Math.max(-event.gamma, -30), 30);\r\n        }, true);\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      draw();\r\n      hook(\'onInit\');\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Style the canvas\r\n     */\r\n    function styleCanvas() {\r\n      canvas.width = element.offsetWidth;\r\n      canvas.height = element.offsetHeight;\r\n      ctx.fillStyle = options.dotColor;\r\n      ctx.strokeStyle = options.lineColor;\r\n      ctx.lineWidth = options.lineWidth;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Draw particles\r\n     */\r\n    function draw() {\r\n      if (!canvasSupport) { return; }\r\n\r\n      winW = window.innerWidth;\r\n      winH = window.innerHeight;\r\n\r\n      // Wipe canvas\r\n      ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\r\n\r\n      // Update particle positions\r\n      for (var i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {\r\n        particles[i].updatePosition();\r\n      };\r\n      // Draw particles\r\n      for (var i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {\r\n        particles[i].draw();\r\n      };\r\n\r\n      // Call this function next time screen is redrawn\r\n      if (!paused) {\r\n        raf = requestAnimationFrame(draw);\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Add/remove particles.\r\n     */\r\n    function resizeHandler() {\r\n      // Resize the canvas\r\n      styleCanvas();\r\n\r\n      var elWidth = element.offsetWidth;\r\n      var elHeight = element.offsetHeight;\r\n\r\n      // Remove particles that are outside the canvas\r\n      for (var i = particles.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\r\n        if (particles[i].position.x > elWidth || particles[i].position.y > elHeight) {\r\n          particles.splice(i, 1);\r\n        }\r\n      };\r\n\r\n      // Adjust particle density\r\n      var numParticles = Math.round((canvas.width * canvas.height) / options.density);\r\n      if (numParticles > particles.length) {\r\n        while (numParticles > particles.length) {\r\n          var p = new Particle();\r\n          particles.push(p);\r\n        }\r\n      } else if (numParticles < particles.length) {\r\n        particles.splice(numParticles);\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      // Re-index particles\r\n      for (i = particles.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\r\n        particles[i].setStackPos(i);\r\n      };\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Pause particle system\r\n     */\r\n    function pause() {\r\n      paused = true;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Start particle system\r\n     */\r\n    function start() {\r\n      paused = false;\r\n      draw();\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Particle\r\n     */\r\n    function Particle() {\r\n      this.stackPos;\r\n      this.active = true;\r\n      this.layer = Math.ceil(Math.random() * 3);\r\n      this.parallaxOffsetX = 0;\r\n      this.parallaxOffsetY = 0;\r\n      // Initial particle position\r\n      this.position = {\r\n        x: Math.ceil(Math.random() * canvas.width),\r\n        y: Math.ceil(Math.random() * canvas.height)\r\n      }\r\n      // Random particle speed, within min and max values\r\n      this.speed = {}\r\n      switch (options.directionX) {\r\n        case \'left\':\r\n          this.speed.x = +(-options.maxSpeedX + (Math.random() * options.maxSpeedX) - options.minSpeedX).toFixed(2);\r\n          break;\r\n        case \'right\':\r\n          this.speed.x = +((Math.random() * options.maxSpeedX) + options.minSpeedX).toFixed(2);\r\n          break;\r\n        default:\r\n          this.speed.x = +((-options.maxSpeedX / 2) + (Math.random() * options.maxSpeedX)).toFixed(2);\r\n          this.speed.x += this.speed.x > 0 ? options.minSpeedX : -options.minSpeedX;\r\n          break;\r\n      }\r\n      switch (options.directionY) {\r\n        case \'up\':\r\n          this.speed.y = +(-options.maxSpeedY + (Math.random() * options.maxSpeedY) - options.minSpeedY).toFixed(2);\r\n          break;\r\n        case \'down\':\r\n          this.speed.y = +((Math.random() * options.maxSpeedY) + options.minSpeedY).toFixed(2);\r\n          break;\r\n        default:\r\n          this.speed.y = +((-options.maxSpeedY / 2) + (Math.random() * options.maxSpeedY)).toFixed(2);\r\n          this.speed.x += this.speed.y > 0 ? options.minSpeedY : -options.minSpeedY;\r\n          break;\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Draw particle\r\n     */\r\n    Particle.prototype.draw = function() {\r\n      // Draw circle\r\n      ctx.beginPath();\r\n      ctx.arc(this.position.x + this.parallaxOffsetX, this.position.y + this.parallaxOffsetY, options.particleRadius / 2, 0, Math.PI * 2, true);\r\n      ctx.closePath();\r\n      ctx.fill();\r\n\r\n      // Draw lines\r\n      ctx.beginPath();\r\n      // Iterate over all particles which are higher in the stack than this one\r\n      for (var i = particles.length - 1; i > this.stackPos; i--) {\r\n        var p2 = particles[i];\r\n\r\n        // Pythagorus theorum to get distance between two points\r\n        var a = this.position.x - p2.position.x\r\n        var b = this.position.y - p2.position.y\r\n        var dist = Math.sqrt((a * a) + (b * b)).toFixed(2);\r\n\r\n        // If the two particles are in proximity, join them\r\n        if (dist < options.proximity) {\r\n          ctx.moveTo(this.position.x + this.parallaxOffsetX, this.position.y + this.parallaxOffsetY);\r\n          if (options.curvedLines) {\r\n            ctx.quadraticCurveTo(Math.max(p2.position.x, p2.position.x), Math.min(p2.position.y, p2.position.y), p2.position.x + p2.parallaxOffsetX, p2.position.y + p2.parallaxOffsetY);\r\n          } else {\r\n            ctx.lineTo(p2.position.x + p2.parallaxOffsetX, p2.position.y + p2.parallaxOffsetY);\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n      ctx.stroke();\r\n      ctx.closePath();\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * update particle position\r\n     */\r\n    Particle.prototype.updatePosition = function() {\r\n      if (options.parallax) {\r\n        if (orientationSupport && !desktop) {\r\n          // Map tiltX range [-30,30] to range [0,winW]\r\n          var ratioX = (winW - 0) / (30 - -30);\r\n          pointerX = (tiltX - -30) * ratioX + 0;\r\n          // Map tiltY range [-30,30] to range [0,winH]\r\n          var ratioY = (winH - 0) / (30 - -30);\r\n          pointerY = (tiltY - -30) * ratioY + 0;\r\n        } else {\r\n          pointerX = mouseX;\r\n          pointerY = mouseY;\r\n        }\r\n        // Calculate parallax offsets\r\n        this.parallaxTargX = (pointerX - (winW / 2)) / (options.parallaxMultiplier * this.layer);\r\n        this.parallaxOffsetX += (this.parallaxTargX - this.parallaxOffsetX) / 10; // Easing equation\r\n        this.parallaxTargY = (pointerY - (winH / 2)) / (options.parallaxMultiplier * this.layer);\r\n        this.parallaxOffsetY += (this.parallaxTargY - this.parallaxOffsetY) / 10; // Easing equation\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var elWidth = element.offsetWidth;\r\n      var elHeight = element.offsetHeight;\r\n\r\n      switch (options.directionX) {\r\n        case \'left\':\r\n          if (this.position.x + this.speed.x + this.parallaxOffsetX < 0) {\r\n            this.position.x = elWidth - this.parallaxOffsetX;\r\n          }\r\n          break;\r\n        case \'right\':\r\n          if (this.position.x + this.speed.x + this.parallaxOffsetX > elWidth) {\r\n            this.position.x = 0 - this.parallaxOffsetX;\r\n          }\r\n          break;\r\n        default:\r\n          // If particle has reached edge of canvas, reverse its direction\r\n          if (this.position.x + this.speed.x + this.parallaxOffsetX > elWidth || this.position.x + this.speed.x + this.parallaxOffsetX < 0) {\r\n            this.speed.x = -this.speed.x;\r\n          }\r\n          break;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      switch (options.directionY) {\r\n        case \'up\':\r\n          if (this.position.y + this.speed.y + this.parallaxOffsetY < 0) {\r\n            this.position.y = elHeight - this.parallaxOffsetY;\r\n          }\r\n          break;\r\n        case \'down\':\r\n          if (this.position.y + this.speed.y + this.parallaxOffsetY > elHeight) {\r\n            this.position.y = 0 - this.parallaxOffsetY;\r\n          }\r\n          break;\r\n        default:\r\n          // If particle has reached edge of canvas, reverse its direction\r\n          if (this.position.y + this.speed.y + this.parallaxOffsetY > elHeight || this.position.y + this.speed.y + this.parallaxOffsetY < 0) {\r\n            this.speed.y = -this.speed.y;\r\n          }\r\n          break;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      // Move particle\r\n      this.position.x += this.speed.x;\r\n      this.position.y += this.speed.y;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * Setter: particle stacking position\r\n     */\r\n    Particle.prototype.setStackPos = function(i) {\r\n      this.stackPos = i;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function option (key, val) {\r\n      if (val) {\r\n        options[key] = val;\r\n      } else {\r\n        return options[key];\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function destroy() {\r\n      console.log(\'destroy\');\r\n      canvas.parentNode.removeChild(canvas);\r\n      hook(\'onDestroy\');\r\n      if ($) {\r\n        $(element).removeData(\'plugin_\' + pluginName);\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function hook(hookName) {\r\n      if (options[hookName] !== undefined) {\r\n        options[hookName].call(element);\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    init();\r\n\r\n    return {\r\n      option: option,\r\n      destroy: destroy,\r\n      start: start,\r\n      pause: pause\r\n    };\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  window[pluginName] = function(elem, options) {\r\n    return new Plugin(elem, options);\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  window[pluginName].defaults = {\r\n    minSpeedX: 0.1,\r\n    maxSpeedX: 0.7,\r\n    minSpeedY: 0.1,\r\n    maxSpeedY: 0.7,\r\n    directionX: \'center\', // \'center\', \'left\' or \'right\'. \'center\' = dots bounce off edges\r\n    directionY: \'center\', // \'center\', \'up\' or \'down\'. \'center\' = dots bounce off edges\r\n    density: 10000, // How many particles will be generated: one particle every n pixels\r\n    dotColor: \'#666666\',\r\n    lineColor: \'#666666\',\r\n    particleRadius: 7, // Dot size\r\n    lineWidth: 1,\r\n    curvedLines: false,\r\n    proximity: 100, // How close two dots need to be before they join\r\n    parallax: true,\r\n    parallaxMultiplier: 5, // The lower the number, the more extreme the parallax effect\r\n    onInit: function() {},\r\n    onDestroy: function() {}\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  // nothing wrong with hooking into jQuery if it\'s there...\r\n  if ($) {\r\n    $.fn[pluginName] = function(options) {\r\n      if (typeof arguments[0] === \'string\') {\r\n        var methodName = arguments[0];\r\n        var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);\r\n        var returnVal;\r\n        this.each(function() {\r\n          if ($.data(this, \'plugin_\' + pluginName) && typeof $.data(this, \'plugin_\' + pluginName)[methodName] === \'function\') {\r\n            returnVal = $.data(this, \'plugin_\' + pluginName)[methodName].apply(this, args);\r\n          }\r\n        });\r\n        if (returnVal !== undefined){\r\n          return returnVal;\r\n        } else {\r\n          return this;\r\n        }\r\n      } else if (typeof options === "object" || !options) {\r\n        return this.each(function() {\r\n          if (!$.data(this, \'plugin_\' + pluginName)) {\r\n            $.data(this, \'plugin_\' + pluginName, new Plugin(this, options));\r\n          }\r\n        });\r\n      }\r\n    };\r\n  }\r\n\r\n})(window, document);\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * requestAnimationFrame polyfill by Erik M\xc3\xb6ller. fixes from Paul Irish and Tino Zijdel\r\n * @see: http://paulirish.com/2011/requestanimationframe-for-smart-animating/\r\n * @see: http://my.opera.com/emoller/blog/2011/12/20/requestanimationframe-for-smart-er-animating\r\n * @license: MIT license\r\n */\r\n(function() {\r\n    var lastTime = 0;\r\n    var vendors = [\'ms\', \'moz\', \'webkit\', \'o\'];\r\n    for(var x = 0; x < vendors.length && !window.requestAnimationFrame; ++x) {\r\n      window.requestAnimationFrame = window[vendors[x]+\'RequestAnimationFrame\'];\r\n      window.cancelAnimationFrame = window[vendors[x]+\'CancelAnimationFrame\']\r\n                                 || window[vendors[x]+\'CancelRequestAnimationFrame\'];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    if (!window.requestAnimationFrame)\r\n      window.requestAnimationFrame = function(callback, element) {\r\n        var currTime = new Date().getTime();\r\n        var timeToCall = Math.max(0, 16 - (currTime - lastTime));\r\n        var id = window.setTimeout(function() { callback(currTime + timeToCall); },\r\n          timeToCall);\r\n        lastTime = currTime + timeToCall;\r\n        return id;\r\n      };\r\n\r\n    if (!window.cancelAnimationFrame)\r\n      window.cancelAnimationFrame = function(id) {\r\n        clearTimeout(id);\r\n      };\r\n}());\r\n\r\ndocument.addEventListener(\'DOMContentLoaded\', function () {\r\n  particleground(document.getElementById(\'particles\'), {\r\n    dotColor: \'#eee\',\r\n    lineColor: \'#eee\'\r\n  });\r\n  var intro = document.getElementById(\'intro\');\r\n  intro.style.marginTop = - intro.offsetHeight / 2 + \'px\';\r\n}, false);\r\n\r\n</script>\n</body>\n</html>\n'
